y4_UjsjmYhHQ0gFA3CFfQw.text: I will hands down never order from Brothers Pizza again. The first time I ordered (carry out), I ordered a cheese and meatball pizza, but the pizza seemed to rather be topped with ground beef instead. Now the second time I ordered, the older delivery driver had such a bad attitude to the point where I wanted to tell him to take his pizza back and get off my property. My bill was $26 and change, however, I only had two $20 bills. I asked if he had change, which he did and that was great! He gave me a $10 and two $5's, which naturally adds up to $20. So in turn, I gave him my $20. Then, I proceeded to give him a $20 and two $5's, adding up to my bill plus a tip. The driver then FREAKED out. He was so enraged and told me that I needed to give him $40 and then he would give me $13 back. That was the conclusion we ended up getting to because I just couldn't argue or explain the situation to him anymore. The whole time we were communicating, his voice was raised. I was at the door with him for about 10 minutes and it was a very uncomfortable experience for not only myself, my dog, but the children that were also inside.

They were generous with the toppings and I think I will give this place a try again. Maybe it won't be as greasy if we dined in instead of ordering delivery.

0-5C6X90REUkjGCY_WWJTw.text: Great pizza, calzone, and garlic balls in a friendly and welcoming environment. What else you can hope for? We went there, my family and obviously our first time, to try their pizza because of the outstanding reviews at Yelp. Approaching at the store, a guy greeted and welcomed us making us feel that he value our business which is a plus factor! He went to help us setting up extra table to accommodate everyone, then came back with the menu for us to peruse and decide. It's a worry free, no pressure environment. Once you're ready you just have to go to the counter to make your order.  As I started this review, we had the brother's special pizza, medium calzone, and garlic balls. Everything is delicious! I gave this restaurant a five star rating because our overall experience was awesome!

655osxCX9VyjwIPybAbstg.text: Don't waste your time here. Pizza is bland and has absolutely zero flavor! Slices are huge but what's the point when it taste like a frozen pizza!

xScvIgLaHGhN5Yy5CUaTvw.text: Finally a place that has a NY style pizza. We moved here from NY not too long ago and craved for pizza. Pizza that we're used to having in NY. There were other places that we tried and claimed to be "NY style". Some were almost and some were way off. First of all, the crust should have the dry look not shiny and it shouldn't have a thick crust. About 1 inch away from the sauce and cheese. The bottom of the pizza should also have that dry flour charred look as well. Like a crusty rustic bread and not oily. It should have 1/4 inch thickness, crispy, and pliable enough to make that fold. Their sauce is slightly thick with a hint of sweetness and not acidic. This pizzeria has it!  We're so happy and will order here regularly.

RvOWk-Mv7Xw9-Iq_9AsMJQ.text: After running some errands to the end of Rainbow I decided to grab some Italian.  There's a lot to choose from in this area for pizza and I've gone to everything in this area.    I was pleasantly surprised to come across this place.  It's new but it has the old school pizzeria feel to it.  They have a great menu with everything I wanted when in a pizza mood.    I got some cheese pizza, garlic knots, a salad  and a drink.  The pizza, knots and salad were perfect.  They give big slices too which is very nice.  It was all very tasty too.   Once again... there's a lot of competition in this area for pizza, but this place is well worth the trip.    GOOD PRICES, GOOD QUALITY AND GOOD SERVICE!!!!

IaEADFSDXpXgmww6awcmwA.text: We kept seeing ads on Instagram for this restaurant, specifically promoting their 50 cent wing Tuesday's & Thursday's. I've tried other wing establishments in the area & have not been impressed. I'm happy to say Brother's Pizza broke the mold!   We ordered 24 wings & the garlic fries. Wing sauces we got were BBQ, Hot, Lemon Garlic, & Spicy Teriyaki. The garlic fries came to us in a heaping pile & covered in garlic, Parmesan cheese, & parsley. They tasted as great as they looked!   And the wings turned out great too! They were big, juicy, and the sauces all tasted good! We highly recommend the spicy teriyaki, it definitely stood out. Their bleu cheese & ranch were on point as well.   I almost forgot! The staff was great! Everybody was attentive & made sure we got our food & enjoyed it.   All in all, we will be coming back here again & want to try their pizza and burgers!

jBMKmD6nUuUXLjko48mmgA.text: We were in the area and tried this place thanks to Yelp, the free garlic balls, and the reviews. I'm happy to say that the Yelpers were on point about this place. The food here is amazing! You cannot beat their $6.99 lunch specials or their $5.99 two slice special. So much food for the price. I came here with a family of five with PLENTY of leftovers. My daughter and I had the spaghetti and meatballs which were fantastic. My wife had the lasagna which was great. My other two children had the slices of pepperoni pizza which was UNBELIEVABLE. The pie here was ridiculous! Also, props to the host, he was so gracious and attentive. He made sure to take care of our family and ensured we were good to go. Come out and try this place NOW!! Some of the best food and best overall value in Las Vegas. Period.

photos.caption: Photo of Brother's Pizza - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lunch menu

lgxK2l13P2kCgg06vMku5Q.text: We unfortunately discovered this gem while at a birthday party on this side of town. Fortunately for us, it's over 20 miles from our house so we won't be tempted to come here every day.   The staff was attentive, helpful, and friendly. We are greeted upon entering. He asked us if it was our first time and when we replied yes, he told us about the free garlic balls when you check in on yelp. So after checking in we took a seat and looked over the menu and the many specials. We settled on pizza, fingers, a 2 liter and added fries.   The garlic balls were so good we couldn't stop eating them. Then out came our chicken fingers and fries. The chicken was perfect and the ranch was amazing! I'm a ranch snob of sorts and this was one of the best I've had in the city. The barbecue sauce and medium buffalo sauce were good too.   Our pizza came out shortly after that and it was good. It's not the best pizza we've had (Di Fara's in Brooklyn is the best), but for Vegas it's good. The amount of food you get for the price is a steal! We had leftovers for the next day. When we are on this side of town again, we'll be stopping in again.

GtD4u7cYAmQN40Ai6QW_YQ.text: It was ok. Honestly, there really isn't much difference between pizza places so what it really comes down to is the little things. Maybe I'm being overly critical but I can't help but be bothered about the sauces. I made an online order. Each sauce is small price but there's still a price. So, I get there a little early and do my yelp check-in and find that they offer free garlic knots with your first yelp check-in. Cool but I can't believe someone actually pays for them. Great that they offer something free but it's literally pizza crust with clarified butter on them. That's it. Kind of like eating a box full of crust which maybe someone else likes but crust is one of my least favorite parts of eating pizza. So, that's why I ordered sauces that cost extra. I was a little early and my order wasn't ready yet. No problem. But, 3 others came in with orders they called in. All 3 of them asked for sauce. I don't think they paid for sauce. They all asked for ranch and the cashier gave them all this giant tub of ranch. I actually PAID for ranch and I get a little rinky dink cup that was barely enough. Really not a huge deal but it did kind of bother me and so then the problems with the pizza stood out. Two things I noticed right away. First, the pizza seemed undercooked...like a lot. It was still a little doughy. Also, I got a basil topping. The basil was WHOLE LEAVES. The flavor of basil is only released when its cut so there was no basil flavor. Also, it's a cheap type of basil. I could have gotten a different topping but was really hoping to get that good savory flavor. Nope plus it was undercooked. I'll pass. Just little things that didn't seem worth the 20 bucks for a small personal size pizza.

XYafyz8syaUQPdA8rHtN7w.text: Brothers Pizza is a great family-friendly pizza joint in the Southwest! Top notch customer service. The guy at the cashier asked how many people I was feeding (three) and recommended their specials. They have a Large 1-topping (18 inch) pizza and 20 wings for $27.99. And if you check-in (first timers), they give you their popular garlic knots for FREE! Let me say that the portion was very giving, not just a sampler; picture soft warm knotted bread bathed in a pool of garlic and butter. And the wings were pretty good as well. Good plump chicken wing size. You can mix up the flavors (no limit). We selected four flavors: Garlic Parmesan, Lemon Pepper, Medium Spice, and Teriyaki. I'd recommend the Garlic Parmesan and buffalo. We've been back twice and they have not disappointed.

VTzVkj7xjlwdGa2hEPmX9Q.text: Good food. Friendly staff. Nice experience.   My kids wanted pizza the other day and I needed to find somewhere we could dine-in. jwqRtEJ1HWcFWVQwt65hEg.text: In Vegas for our annual convention & in looking for a pizzeria to deliver lunch. Because of the great reviews I decided to give Brother's Pizza a try. The order was correct, the food delivered promptly and the food was delicious. We had a variety of orders, and everyone was happy with their food. We ordered for 3 days and enjoyed every bite. Thanks Harry & Brother's Pizza for your authentic Italian food! By the way... the pizza slices alone remind me of NY!

9-axS0z6a7KkpMyScBb91A.text: Finally made my way to Brothers Pizza After hearing about them all over Las Vegas, it was destiny for me to make my way there.  Let me tell you, they have definitely perfected their #LemonGarlic flavored wings! Extra crispy and extra meaty.   They brought out some #Medium flavored wings also. The medium is always the test for me. If you can make good medium wings, I will take it that you know wings. These didn't disappoint either. Crispy and extra saucey, I enjoyed each bite.  But wait there's more.. They have a full menu that will blow your mind.  Think of an Italian meal, they got it! Click the link to check out all the info including menu items, hours of operation and location.  I also tried their loaded Stromboli and their Zeppolis which were both amazing.  Will definitely come back soon to try their other wing flavors. If anyone wants to meet me for wings, I'll accept the invite.  These were great!  **Shout out to @food_dude_702 for the invite and Harry for taking care of me on my visit.   #AntonioIsFly #Wings #ChickenWings #Fit #Fitness #FollowMe #LasVegas #Home #Foodie #WingFest #Travel #BrothersPizzaLV

QhPayTrOC_l8VzYVyNKnyw.text: I'm pretty split down the middle here. I've ordered wings from them twice which were excellent. Plenty of meat on each piece and never felt cheated on the sauce. Their ranch is very good as well. I would say their wings are pretty much on par with Wing Stop which I really like and it's a much closer option than any wing stop.  The pizza on the other hand was one of the worst I've had. Really floppy and in a way soggy in the middle. The crust was pretty good but the interior of the pizza was not good at all. Flavor of the ingredients was average and I couldn't taste the sauce much. We ordered a half pepperoni and jalapeno and the other half some kind of Supreme. I was hoping it would be good cold but it was still the same texture. I'll definitely get their wings anytime I have a craving but I wouldn't recommend the pizza based on what we had.  The garlic knots are really good too and for 3 bucks it's a steal.

8fhi6TzLHzj1snrZ44SzCw.text: When I searched Yelp for Pizza in Las Vegas, Brothers came up as "Hot and New" and they had almost all 5 star reviews.  My wife wanted me to find a pizza place for one meal on this Vegas trip, and this is what I came up with.  We were not disappointed.   When we arrived they asked if we had been there before.  Then they asked how we heard of them.  When I told them I found them on Yelp, they reminded me of the free order of Garlic Bites for checking in.  Great Deal!  They were very good.  We ordered a pick your own 4 item 14" Pizza and 12 Honey BBQ Boneless Wings with some Ranch Dressing.  On the Pizza we had white sauce, chicken, bacon, garlic, and pineapple.  It was very good, crust and all.  The Boneless Wings were very tender and tasty.  We just ate at Buffalo Wild Wings a day earlier and I preferred the Wings at Brothers over BWW.  My wife absolutely loved the Ranch dressing that they use.  When we ordered water to drink, they gave us each a bottle on the house. The two employees were very nice and helpful.  The only thing negative that I can say is that one of the employees is a New England Patriots fan.  Go EAGLES!!!!!

KodXSKYZFnxCRF2Vbs_h4A.text: I am so glad that I found this place. Pizza was what we decided for dinner and instead of the usual Domino's, I decided to search on Yelp. This gem popped up as the new and hot spot in the area. Nothing but amazing 5-Star reviews and delicious looking pictures, so we had no choice but to try it and it definitely didn't disappoint.   We ordered their special that included a 18" 1-topping pizza and 20 wings for $25.99. We also ordered fries for $1.99 and we received an order of garlic bites for free with our Yelp check-in.   The pizza was delicious. Crispy and cheesy. Just like an amazing New York pizza. For the wings we got mild and garlic parm. It was perfectly cooked. Big and crunchy. The mild sauce was tasty and the garlic parm was amazing. The garlic flavor was on point! The fries was crispy and cooked to perfection. For $1.99, you got more than your money's worth. It came in a big container. The garlic bites was also delicious. Crunchy bottom, soft bread and tasty flavor. Such a perfect pair to their marinara sauce. The marinara sauce was very flavorful. Just the right amount of spices. Oh, they're ranch is homemade and delicious!   Totally pleased with this place. From the phone encounter, in person pick up experience and food, they deserve every star possible. Such a friendly and amazing family ran restaurant. Keep it up Brother's Pizza and thank you for coming to the Southwest! My family and I will definitely be back!

7bSBPoVkg6cIufDnPVroGg.text: Ordered delivery from the website. It was 0.50 cheaper for delivery compared to Uber Eats. In my experience, the website did not provide updates for delivery time, rather it just stayed on "confirmed".   Ordered a 14" pizza, plain wings (well done) with medium on the side, and garlic balls.   Garlic balls were good and for the price, hard to beat. I ordered marinara sauce with the garlic balls, but got ranch instead. Wings were not quite as crispy as I thought well done would be. I ordered sauce on the side to make sure they were not soggy by the time they were delivered. Medium sauce was very good and would highly recommend. The pizza, to be honest, didn't wow me. It was very doughy, and lacked flavor. I had to throw it in the oven at home to get the crust to get a slight crisp, otherwise it would have been the same consistency as Costco pizza.    Not sure I'll order from here again.

rMGnMkJLbRCWCp639dAdWw.text: New to the area and felt like trying out the local pizza establishments. Yelp had this as a five star location so why try a lessor establishment? Great decision. "Special" was free garlic balls if you checked in on Yelp. This is where I felt they could have done better. The balls were fully cooked and could not absorb the garlic sauce. The sauce with marinara sauce were used with the pizza slice crusts. Yumm!  Free bottles of water!   Definitely a return is in order!!!!

BWjdjwYOlQpNIXiEFr85yA.text: Great reasonable Italian dishes and pizza with generous portions. Other items for the burger or chicken fans as well. I had the Chicken Marsala and they nailed the sauce! You get to even choose your pasta on that dish.  My wife had the Spaghetti Meatballs.  We both have lunch for tomorrow!  Very friendly staff.  We dined in and were checked on to make sure we had everything we needed. One of the things we liked the most was that they provided a chilled grated cheese shaker on our table for use throughout our dinner.  I didn't need it on the Marsala, but my wife enjoyed it on her Spaghetti! Another True local LV gem!  And so close to home. We will be back soon!

uqJ4MYWpcvB-gh5Y5GZvxA.text: I decided to make it into Brothers Pizza because of all the Yelp Love they were getting and I wanted Pizza! Brothers Pizza has another Vegas location but this one is on Rainbow, close to my hood. Very convenient for those who live in the Enterprise area of Vegas.  The menu is impressive and there is so much to choose from. For those who want lunch there are great lunch specials for just under $7, I figured I would venture getting in on that lunch action soon. Everyone in Brothers are super friendly and very helpful.   We ordered the Gyro pizza with cilantro, wings and the garlic balls that came with Yelp Check-In. So check in and get your free balls! Everything was great and they made even better leftovers. The pizza is NY style and the ingredients are quality. The gyro pizza was fantastic, not heavy on the gyro and the fresh cilantro added made the pizza impressive. The  Wings were crisp and the sauces were tasty. The sauces are made in house so that is one reason they are extra good. We ordered the garlic parmesan that had butter welling at the bottom, I dipped my crust in it! We also ordered the mild with a side off hot sauce because my daughter likes them mild. All good! As for the garlic balls with the free check in, they have to be the best free food item on Yelp in Vegas. You get a lot of them and they are soft, hot and full of garlic, butter and parmesan.  What a great addition to Rainbow Blvd and the Enterprise area. Welcome my Brothers!

zu1RpMIw8Cera87KMabEeQ.text: This is a hidden gem of a pizza place. They just went through a rebranding a month ago and the new owners and staff are amazing.   We were hungry after a long day and decided we wanted pizza and wings. This place looked delicious and so we drove over and were shocked at all the amazing specials they were running. We were able to get way too much food for 3 people for around 30$, including garlic knots, pizza, wings and drinks.   They make their own sauce here and use a very premium cheese and it comes through in both the quality of the pizza and the taste. I am not a crust person and ate every last bite of my crust on the ginormous slices of pizza they provide. An 18 in was enough to feed all of us, though they do offer both 24inch and 30in pizzas as well.   The best deals though are the lunch specials. Go by and check them out for yourself. You won't be disappointed!

This is an awesome place to come to enjoy some appetizing Italian food so bring your appetite and enjoy!

mumHIDrQa828HwwnRjSyRg.text: I love pizza.  I love trying new pizza places.  I tend to move a lot so wherever I end up you bet I'm searching for the best pizza around.  With that said,  I moved to the SW part of town and my favorite pizza place in town (Naked City) has a shop closeby.  I have a soft spot in my heart for them because I'm from Buffalo/ They're from Buffalo.  But they've been inconsistant and their service ain't always great.  Enter Brother's Pizza.  I decided to try them out as a recommendation from the Slice App.  They are now in the running for my favorite pizza place in Vegas.  I love their pizza.  It's an extremely solid traditional pizza with a thinner crust but not NYC style necessa-celery.  And still unique in it's own right.  My go-to pizza from Brother's is the 4-topping deal with Pepperoni, Sausage, Jalapeno, and Sun Dried Tomatoes.  OMFG.  And they offer their pizzaa in like 6 or 7 different sizes.  They may be slightly pricier than the local chain pizza spotz but that price difference goes a LONG way.  The quality of their ingredients is great.  It's just a solid, rich, delicious slice of pizza.  And I believe this is a one off - family owned spot. So buy their pizzas now because they're fantastic and you're supporting a small mom n pop shop.  P.S.  this review is based solely on their pizza.  I have not tried anything else there or dined in at their shop.

9RgxlsmLL57TErhhB4QBpg.text: The lunch specials are on point!!! Got the lasagna and small pizza.  Was tasty.  Will be coming back to try more!

iyEhidxPF10zCUewnC3fpg.text: I liked this place even though the crust didn't meet my expectations. I chalk it up to not everyone demanding crispy but chewy pizza crust like I do. The bottom line is that the pizza tasted very good and had great toppings. It was also huge and this will be the first place i will call every time I need pizza for a party with more than 10 people. I don't love that the pizza isn't cut into wedge shaped slices but I guess I don't know how they would do that with pizzas this large without having each slice be about the same overall size as a medium pizza at a regular pizza restaurant. The other menu items are great and the service was friendly and helpful. This is definitely above average pizza

AOInsK53LTs8sJlrU_eaTg.text: I absolutely have no complaints with this place at all. Everything was great. Food was delicious, huge portions, and menu is very diverse and easily customizable that there's literally something for anyone. Chicken tenders were juicy and crunchy, flavors were there and the heat teased you a little. Philly cheese steak was a surprise because it was perfectly balanced and so juicy. Garlic balls were a definite bonus so make you check in so you can get those delicious addictive doughy garlic flavor. I'm definitely going to come back to try other things on the menu.

St-A2jjkWhPQlrZ92epmew.text: For a non-pizza lover like me I love Brother's Pizza.  This place is a hole in the wall in Southwest Las Vegas. Their interior decorations is nothing to speak of but their food keeps their business going.   Like what i mentioned, I'm a non-pizza lover. I don't look for it and I don't crave for it. But when my family does, expect us to order delivery from Brother's. We just like pizza that doesn't taste like franchise pizza. It's like the home cooked version of the pizza places in town. Does that make sense?   The good thing too about these types of restaurants is of there's an error to your order, expect them to go above and beyond to make it right. Our most recent one was the first time they made a mistake with the size of the pizza. So by the time they realized it, they made 2 pizzas for us.   I highly recommend any of their pizzas, you can always do half and half. Our kids love the cheesy bread. And I always order their lasagna.   One suggestion.. maybe find a local place that can make real good cheesecake. I don't know if they make their own but when i ordered their strawberry cheesecake it was slightly frozen and the strawberry was not the chunky version but more of a swirl on the cheesecake.

YlPEMhEIeXRvBO7HOW3tsQ.text: I've got two words for ya: lunch specials. They're incredible. Giant portions, ready fast enough to pop by on your lunch break, super low pricing. You can even get these deals ordering online so you can pull in, grab and go, and eat back at work, and there are options for everyone with pizza, salad, hot and cold sandwiches, wings, and tenders, all with a drink. I cannot stress enough how good the pricing is here.  So far, I've tried the eggplant parm lunch special- sandwich is hefty, clocking in at what seems like an entire pound, covered with melted cheese and served with a mountain of fries. This was easily two lunches for me and I didn't even finish the fries. Came back for a slice and wing special, which was nearly  a quarter of a pizza. Also didn't finish this but will definitely be back for more wings and a specialty pie- heads up, they're BOGO half off weekdays 2-5PM. I don't live or work nearby but I will be back.

QuG60E6itnS9Hw9Qgyb0mw.text: This was my first time ordering from this pizza place, and definitely not my last time.  I called to place an order for some pizza for my employees. They have lots of great selections and combo deals as well. I ended up ordering an 18inch vegetarian pizza and a 32inch meat lovers pizza. I was quoted a wait time for 25 minutes. Not bad!   Upon arriving to pick up, I see lots of great deals posted on the windows. So I'll definitely be ordering again on one of those days.  The staff was super welcoming and friendly and everything was ready to go as I arrived.  I even checked in and got some free garlic knots to give to my employees.   On the wall it shows the pan sizes which is an awesome way of knowing if you have enough or not enough.  The 32inch pizza was huge! Lol and everyone enjoyed it.  I definitely enjoyed the vegetable pizza with ranch.   Garlic knots were good. And I also added a cheesecake for myself.   The owner helped me and took the pizzas out to my car since my order would be a handful. Definitely very thoughtful and friendly!  Will be back to get more pizzas for my staff!  Thank you!

zXsGtuB4hBQqcdUTWZ_ZOw.text: Went here back in 2015 when this place was called Brother's Italian Bistro and found it somewhat mediocre. After seeing many ads and deals and the fact that I live super close I decided to give this place another try and realized it had been under new management for about a year now. I got a $6.99 lunch special with a personal pepperoni pizza and a fountain drink before headin' over to UNLV, and boy was it delicious! I came back today to get another one because this pizza is so damn good! The new management is great and I can tell they care about what they do!

hRQKF1tFO1KuLlKK6bnwmA.text: This place is amazing! My husband called to see if they have seating to dine in and they were so nice on the phone (rare nowadays lol). We got there at 10pm and everyone working was so welcoming. Customer service was awesome. You don't get that anymore really so I was super impressed. Okay, now about the food... amazing! The prices are very reasonable and the portions are big. Overall great experience, this will be are go to pizza joint. Thank you for the great service.

3xiCYN04YgVLzWlKgXGIsw.text: This little hole in the wall joint has bomb pizza. My family was craving pizza and it was 11:30pm so our options on pizza restaurants were limited.  Good thing Brothers Pizza is open late nights 9am-1am (til 3am on weekends) For their pizzas they range from 10" to 30". You can even order each half a different style which is what we did.  We did half 5 cheese and the other half verde pizza. Both were delish. I enjoyed the verde pizza better because it had mostly veggies on it. Their wings were just ok. They have tons of fast food options such as wings, fingers, soups, ribs, stromboli, calzones, salads, burgers, sandwiches, breakfast, and desserts. Amazing service from Harry, he upgraded the size our pizza, thank you! Don't forget to check in to receive your free garlic balls.

JwSf4JYeG1_fvIW8lHVA_Q.text: Boyfriend craves pizza for dinner. Went to look at yelp somewhere close and found this gem. Seen they had great reviews so we went to check it out. Upon entering we were greeted with friendly and nice customer service. Huge menu, good specials with very reasonable prices. We ordered 16" pepperoni pizza, 8 chicken wings (medium and Spicy honey Bbq) and a free garlic balls that came in with Yelp check-in. They have the best buffalo wings and Pizza was pretty good that you won't be disappointed. The Garlic balls- OMG! We are so hooked! It's buttery, soft and delicious paired with marinara sauce. Everything came out hot and fresh. I was so happy we found this place. This is our new go to pizza joint. Can't wait to try other items on their menu. Highly recommend.

bd5TZfsS70nY-8DSihiRBQ.text: Seen the lunch specials on yelp and was excited this place was so close to my house.  The lunch specials are awesome $7.50 for a full portion and a drink that's a deal.   I ordered the lasagna which came with garlic bread. The lasagna was just ok, it was DROWNING in sauce I literally couldn't tell what was sauce and what was part of the noodles or filling. There was little to no meat in my lasagna which was a little disappointing. This was my first try of this place and will probably opt for a lunch special pizza next time.

UhLGNbpk8qb9F-NJ3ekK0g.text: This place caught my eye because of the 2 slice, 1 drink for $5.99 combo. It's all day too! The cashier asked me if I wanted to add toppings so I chose black olives and pepperoni and he didn't charge me extra which was nice. He also asked if I wanted my pizza to be crispy (yes) and if I wanted ranch (heck yes). I read that they make their own ranch so of course I had to try it. There is a fee for the ranch FYI. It's $1 for a pretty decent size container (see pics). The ranch is bomb! I highly recommend getting it. I could seriously drink it if I wasn't concerned about my health. Food is fast to arrive and omg are the slices huge! I was only able to eat 1 slice. The pizza was cooked perfectly, the crust was crispy like how I requested. I do compare my pizzas to the ones from NYC and while these didn't hit quite the spot to ones from NYC, I would still come back. I also ordered a side of fries and they were delicious. I like the fries that have those crispy nuggets on the outside which is exactly what these are. Come check them out!

nl4aH-XluTqWF2Eyivx3VA.text: Over the past couple of months my family and I have become regulars at Brother's thanks to their friendly and cordial atmosphere, great staff, excellent food of good portions, and the added touch of free bottled water, offered at no cost. CPHFhygi053XAbSvJ-qjCA.text: All of the places in Vegas that do $5.99 deals for 2 slices and a drink, this place is definitely the best. I was told to check in to receive a delicious order of the garlic knots.  The sauce on the side was also delicious.   Seeing the wings in person will definitely bring me back. This is some of the best pizza I've had in while.

XfUKcFEe20RLeA-qKsA_Ow.text: Brother's has been our go to for a couple years now.  The food is excellent and their portion sizes are great. We generally get the chicken wings with fries. The wings are big and really good. They aren't breaded so they are great for low carb eaters. I think my favorite thing there, though, is their fries and homemade ranch dressing.  I could make a meal out of just those! (and I have). The guys there are always friendly and aim to please. They recently updated the inside a bit. It's a small place not offering luxury seating, but it's comfortable and friendly. Their lunch specials are a great deal. They offer a huge variety and most are $6.95 or less. Everything is always freshly cooked. They do a great job! I recommend Brothers to everyone I know.

UzEw9xlkRcPP6USD2wax-Q.text: We're a family that LOVES eating chicken wings and fingers. After doing a little shopping tonight, we decided to grab some wings for dinner, however my wife was craving chicken fingers instead. You know how you Yelp in hopes that you'll discover some fantastic new place? Well that's kinda what happened, except I don't think this place is quite new. Matter of fact, these guys are old school and I mean old school when it comes to the Vegas pizza business. Don't be mistaken, this isn't your ordinary neighborhood pizza joint. When we first pulled up in front of this place we sat in the car for about 10mins. What got us here was the 5star on Yelp, however from the parking lot looking-in it just looked like a pizza joint.   From the moment we walked in their phone was ringing off the hook. People were coming in to pick up orders. As busy as they were, they still greeted us and sat us at the table. Then they brought us cups for the fountain machine without paying a dime yet. Wow.   Now for the food. The True test was the chicken fingers and let me tell you.... excellent!!!! These fingers were all meat and it tasted like fresh chicken. Not sure if they make it themselves or what but again their fingers have to be in my book the top 3 best chicken fingers place in Vegas. On top of great fingers, the wings were just as meaty and perfectly cooked. I can keep going about how great this place was but try it yourself. I would be VERY surprised to hear anything much different then what I've mentioned here. Enjoy!

MIeIpANKrxqXObJf87ddbQ.text: My kids wanted pizza so I thought I'd give this place a try. We dined in and ordered their special, which was a large pizza and wings for $15, we added a side of fries and only wanted water (which he gave us bottled water at no extra charge!) and also got free garlic bread bites for checking in. It all totaled to less than $20!  The pizza was cheesy and satisfying, wings were juicy and tasty, the fries were cooked perfectly to a nice crisp, and garlic bites were light and chewy. Their ranch and marinara dipping sauces are homemade and sooo delicious. The ranch had a nice garlicky and fresh taste unlike the bottled kind and the marinara had that rich, slow cooked, flavorful taste to it. Our server was not only kind and gave great service, but also so welcoming and grateful to have us there. I love these small neighborhood businesses that take pride in their work and food. Thank you! I'll be back for that marinara sauce with a side of pasta  Everything was great!

IBk3x_aLlGlA1fzCHiRhCg.text: I just want to say that this place exceeded my expectations to the point where I felt obligated to make my first yelp review. At first glance, this place didn't stand out in my eyes. It seemed like a typical pizza joint with some decent stuff. Then I take a peak at that 5 star rating and it got me curious. What makes this place stand out? So a friend and I had to check it out. We go in and the first thing we get is one of the warmest, most genuine welcomes I've had at an eating establishment. Some of the friendliest and easygoing people without being too overbearing or fake. The cashier then gives us recommendations for 4 slices of pizza, 12 pieces of wings, fries, and a free order of garlic knots when we checked in. The total came out to around $24, so about $12 each for a friend and I. The amount of food was enough for 2 meals for each of us. The quality of everything was amazing. Just go try it out. To put it simply this place has great value, great quality, and great service.

7HGLZ5QMLCiCRMkKvRdrfg.text: We came here the other night based off a yelp reviews and we were definitely happy on our decision. We walked in and it's a cute little restaurant with smiling faces. We didn't feel rushed as we didn't know what we wanted. There were 2 people who had helped us, a younger guy who put in our order for the free garlic balls and an older gentleman who took our order. We were taking it to go, the daily special of pizza wings and a soda for 20 dollars but he recommended the takeout special with just pizza and wings for 15.99 which was actually all we wanted. He gave us a free water as we waited as well. The customer service was amazing and the food was just as good. I even recommended to my friend and she went the same night and loved it just as much. This is our new pizza spot and I'm excited to try all their other menu items.

The ranch was made in house and you can taste of what seemed to be a hint of garlic. Fries were not disappointing as well. They had a deal to throw in a pizza which was also well worth it. Dough had a soft but crisp crust while the bottom was crispy thin but not like a flatbread. Overall the food is well worth my business, I'll be telling people in the area to definitely try this place out. As well for anybody reading this, go, simply go lol  Service was also very good, I think one of these brothers was taking my order and bringing out the food.

n1eTOgLd-4DsaItn309Seg.text: Randomly stopped in to try this place since it's close to where I live and I have to say I don't regret my decision! It has a very mom and pop pizza spot vibe to it. The workers were VERY attentive and made sure that we had everything we needed! My group checked in and got the garlic balls, we ordered some wings of various flavors (medium, hot BBQ, garlic parmesan, and lemon garlic), and two 18-inch pizzas (Super Mario and Hula Hula).  Well let me start by saying the pizza was huge! I think we were hungrier than we thought because we had so many leftovers (which was great for a late snack LOL). I loved the combination of meats on the Mario Pizza that made it so flavorful. The Hula Hula was also very tasty but I hope that no one can mess up a good Hawaiian style pizza! I thought all of the wings were worth trying but the Hot BBQ was a little too much for me. Not only am I a wimp with spicy foods, but I felt that the flavor was a little compromised. After all was said and done, I realized there was a lot of garlic on everything we ate so my breath was a little bad LOL but I would definitely go back here. I really liked the vibe of the restaurant a lot.

68Y9mLjCrnt_WAdfjxqwHA.text: Ordered the 30" pizza and sweet potato fries. Everything was delicious and the pizza was giant! Great for large parties. This will be my go to pizza delivery from now on.

0fnILMFvqmapRfKmOBzb-w.text: The best thing of Brothers Pizza is their ranch I don't know how they make it but it is amazing. Be warned if you call to place an order they do have a carry-out special they don't tell you about when you call but you can ask. I would recommend checking your food before leaving the restaurant since I have often had an item left out. The pizza is good, not always worth the hassle.

JkO2vwzfh2iXJDfIS_q-TQ.text: Got a flyer from Brother's Pizza on my door and was curious about the restaurant. Checked out Yelp's review and decided to go and try it. Let's just say we were extremely happy with the food. We ordered the #1 special: 1 topping pizza, 12 wings and a 2 liter soda. We also checked in on Yelp and received at order of garlic balls. The food was excellent. The pizza was cheesy and the crust was nice and crunchy. The garlic Parmesan wings was delicious. And the garlics balls were addictive. We will guarantee go back for more.

I4OGMjJc_OFRjGz5Z5T2gQ.text: Orderd a pepperoni pizza and wings and it was delicious! Will be my new spot when Im craving pizza.

lBNr1o3VK2qdHQSp9cNUtg.text: This place seriously has the best pizza and wings. Lol I've honestly only had the cheese pizza because I share with my picky toddler, but it's soooo delicious, I can only imagine what a pizza with all the works would taste like.  I've ordered their hot wings with extra sauce and *drool*... never been disappointed. Their ranch is also so creamy and delicious, not like many other places that have watered down ranch "dressing", yuck!  I should also mention that I've ordered through DoorDash and my wings have been scorching hot upon arrival.  5/5

2hG3C9qEcpQTJsP04yDxIA.text: Consistently excellent! Whenever we're in the mood for pizza and wings, this is where we go. The food is always good, the prices and specials are great, and the staff is always nice.

JGNNTyRNrwSLhm_GVoMt_Q.text: From the warm welcome greeting at the front door, the amazing service throughout the dining experience and of course the finger licking food. This spontaneous family dinner in this hole in the wall pizza shop has been a far greater experience than those fancy establishments we've wasted our time and appetite in. I am beyond ecstatic to know that this place is right in our neighborhood. Too bad it took us this long to find it but just overall happy that we did. Thank you! We will be back.   Forgot to add, we had the daily special of 16inch 1-topping pizza and 20 chicken wings, chicken parmesan sandwich w/ seasoned fries AND FREE garlic knots when you check in Yelp. The food was outstanding and though we were a party of 3 hungry and ready to eat, I would say it was good for 6people. Trust and believe  your money and appetite will not go to waste!!!!

6yFAhzbqrNg2Gbh6Bn6cYA.text: It's really tough to find good pizza in Vegas.  The hubby and I had a taste for pizza and found Brothers on here - with some pretty good reviews.  We got excited and ordered one up.  It ended up being the same old bland pizza we've found everywhere else is Vegas.  We each ate one piece (of a 16" to boot!) and threw the rest away.  The only really great pizza we have found in Vegas is at the Chicago Brewing Company in the Four Queens.  Sure wish they'd open up some other locations (we only get down there about 6x a year).

bOWToUc0I1nRBRaX_VvaOA.text: This has become one of my favorites spots to order from. I usually get pizza and wings and have it delivered. They are always nice - they have helped me carry my order to the car when I picked it up and during one pick up they forgot my garlic knots so they then delivered them to me for free. The pizza is great and I love their medium buffalo sauce. They deliver pretty far as well, farther than most small shops similar to them. I order it when my friends come over and now most of them love it as well.

7x7ZRMSNseCqpC5kpL7a2g.text: I found them on yelp because my pregnancy cravings wanted pizza. There was pictures of  the special they are having which is  2 slices & a soda for $5.99. So I had to go check it out.   As I entered I was greeted right away and the guy who took my order was very nice, he told me that they just opened up and I was like that's great because I found them on yelp. I ordered the 2 slices of cheese with a soda & garlic balls.   Garlic balls came out and they are enough to feed 4 but I'm by myself so I will definitely take the extra leftovers home. Then my 2 slices of pizza came out and they are huge!!!! They all taste so good.   I would come back for sure!! Great tasting food and deals.

mkqHjDo472fOfiPqDQifAA.text: Pizza was pretty good and the wings were fantastic, I got them naked with sauce on the side and the wings were crispy. The price was great very affordable.  Extensive menu. I will be going back for sure.

tOmhqmNicJcUPIuwwV9pSw.text: Coming back for seconds! Awesome pizza and friendly staff.  Had an 18" 4 topping - sausage double mushroom onion with black olives on half and garlic knots. Everything done to perfection and at last a reasonably priced pizza joint!

2MoorGNSvzuuHTYaZxEjnQ.text: Great pizza, and great service. I love being able to support a local pizza place. I like that they have seating, too.

photos.caption: Photo of Brother's Pizza - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Plenty of room if you want to dine in.

Thank you Brothers Pizza for a delicious pizza .!

h-xEmDQ2TVRnr4UEs85ikg.text: This is our new pizza place!!!! They have pasta and much more as well. Went there because i wanted something other than little ceasars and it was the best decision. Exceptional customer service and great deals

IKs0wzMPPshQzPV6o2xHdQ.text: Best service ever! This place is a hidden gem. The food is amazing and prices are fair. I'm so happy we found this place. They're new and it's a family owned business and you can tell they care about their customers. We had the Caveman pizza and it was so good. We also had their spicy BBQ wings and added fries for just a $1. Everything was good and would definitely be back

photos.caption: Photo of Brother's Pizza - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy bbq wings with fries added for just $1

KVEd6b3M5iZ0_Ephlh2oQw.text: Came across this place on Yelp and did a pickup order. Location was easy to find off of Rainbow and the place looked clean upon entering. Not only was the staff friendly over the phone, but in person as well. Ordered the 20pcs chicken wings with fries and the Super Mario with sausage added. Plus the garlic balls. I liked how the garlic balls were bite sized and not too soggy. Check in on Yelp if it is your first time! The fries were still crispy and good by the time I got home despite the steam. The Super Mario was similar to a Supreme pizza and the crust was crispy and cooked just right. The only thing about the pizza was the feta cheese made the it a little dry, maybe adding more of the pizza sauce would've helped. The wings were good, half mild and half garlic Parmesan. Tossed evenly. Overall, I would come back and possibly try some of their other menu items and toppings.

yw6wVs-EWRIb9PmbA5Wa4w.text: We called in an order for delivery. The person who took it was friendly and efficient. Their specials are an amazing value and everything came as expected. I do wish they had been clear about the $4.50 delivery fee when placing the order, but the food was such a great value it's not a problem and I'd gladly pay it again. They even honored their check in special for garlic knots even though it's intended for in house customers only, I appreciated that. Look forward to ordering again.

IsPTprASDRu-A114Pwg01g.text: The pizza and wings are fantastic! The garlic knots are delicious. They have some really affordable lunch specials which can honestly be split between two people.

5NuSKzTTxT3678elOVxQqA.text: We found this little hidden gem right here on yelp. Brothers pizza is a very good pizza/Italian joint. I had chicken wings and my partner had the chicken marsala. The chicken wings were crispy and had enough sauce to give it that great flavor! The chicken Marsala was absolutely superb ! The sauce was like an explosion of flavor and honestly I was jealous that I didn't get that. We haven't tried anything else, but I am sure that their pizza is just as good. Affordable and they deliver.

tbIXVhKNuVK43t9jYJT9Ag.text: We are visiting from SoCal, didnt know where to get a good pizza so went to Yelp. The reviews were right on, this a great pizza, one of the best I've had. Worth the trip from the strip.

OEWaE-QMWEltSgr_3nlcKA.text: Best pizza place around this area!! Prices ain't bad either! Only place I'll go for pizza and wings!!!

gKfCEIhWop3OVuU5ldYcng.text: Always the best pizza made everytime we order for carry out n pick up. We looooove how it is so moist n yummy the pizza crust is! Two thumbs up for this pizza place my yelpers!!!

0FFOPlmf5OfT8tvL7NLBwA.text: It all starts with service and ends with food. This place has that covered. Outstanding service and quality food. Strongly recommend it.

Y-8CUwxEzqefTXwB0k-6qw.text: My boyfriend picked up food from here and the service was excellent! They made sure our order was correct before we left. Food is amazing, a must try ! Not your typical pizza place since they have great deals and prices as well. Will be coming back when I have pizza cravings

bTa8xVrF512zJnRH9e68UA.text: Outstanding, would drive across town to enjoy a hot, delicious, fresh taste of Brothers Pizza. The portion sizes are enough to make you realize you not only got a great taste, but you also get outstanding value; you won't be hungry, and you'll know you had great taste. If you haven't tried them, go, now!

2yrWrIDzd08kkRyW1J_RFw.text: So good and service was great. I like that they present the food when you pick it up. This is my second time eating here and I was very pleased again. This is definitely my favorite pizza shop and now they have later hours for us graveyard people. Keep it up!

The only problem is that I ordered a pepperoni and green olive pizza, but I received a pepperoni and green pepper pizza by mistake.

lr5KY4zjs96YP4nb3UQsIw.text: Literally the best pizza and wings I've ever had. Found this place on yelp when looking for places to eat for lunch. Not disappointed at all!!! All around 5 stars on the food and the customer service was great. It's a must come when traveling to Vegas.

0x-fX7puVZrNaZ6g7mIxEg.text: Delicious, authentic pizza. Friendly, patient staff. I've been on the search for a great pizza place since I moved, and I've found it!

BEHgLj-719lKXcir63qUiQ.text: We love pizza, and we're looking for something authentic and off the strip. We decided to try Brothers Pizza on our way into Vegas and were pleased! The lunch portions are unbelievable, the taste is amazing, and the staff was very friendly & welcoming! Would definitely stop her again on our next Vegas trip!

7MRR-XeEGyNjCbUTlWm7nA.text: No consistancy! I have used them for years. I have had perfect subs, 5 star food. Then the next time I order I get wrong cheese, wrong condaments, and burned bread. Does no one oversee quality? They can do great food but it's a crap shoot

KoYBMCXxP815VJ84Hr24sA.text: The food here is great. We ordered the chicken wings-garlic parmesan chicken wings and a 10inch pizza. We also got free homemade garlic knots which were amazing just by checking in. The prices are very reasonable and the quality of food is great. This is definitely on our list of places we will go back to.

BkvwBlND0gP1ScoPSdeIFQ.text: Our family of 5 can never agree on the type of food to eat. Went to Brothers Pizza because of their diverse menu and we all had something different (lasagna, spaghetti, pasta, wings). Ever person was happy with their dish, but the wings were amazing. The most important part of dining is customer service and the blew that out of the park. Great experience and will be back again soon!!

JlmmluMItvv2YrRm9_wrbg.text: Very good pizza and the wings were great!  Will be back soon.  The service was great and fast.

MvwGYkzDSTAY_19FeyBohA.text: This place has a great little mom and pop feel. The place is new, but already feels classic. Harry, the owner, took my order and he was awesome. Gave me great suggestions and even hooked it up with a free order of garlic balls. I ordered the alfredo fettuccini with shrimp and the spaghetti with meatballs. Both were absolutely delicious! I will definitely be coming back, not just for the food, but also the great service

kPYeAzISzgVtkHjkYPqSoQ.text: Tried this last night from a Yelp review. Was awesome from the min we arrived. Great service, recommendations & food! It's nothing fancy, but food made up for it. Loved the crust on the pizza - crispy on the outside, but chewy. Caesar salad & garlic balls were a great starter. Best part, left over pizza today was just as good! I'll be back for sure! Well done Brothers Pizza.

3_3LHlUjsWtLCSweJgKHvA.text: My husband and I decided to try a new place and unfortunately we were very disappointed! We ordered a delivery order from door dash, the delivery was fine with time and all but once we opened the food omg! So the wings were cold and had very little sauce on them, they were supposed to be medium heat and had no heat at all probably from the lack of sauce on them. Then we tried the super Mario pizza.....yikes! It was so greasy! Also we thought it was weird to have feta cheese on a pizza and we were so excited to try it out,  when we saw the few select crumbles scattered over a 16" pizza we were not impressed, why even put it on. The pizza was also not hot when we received it either. All we ordered was a medium pizza and 12 wings and it was $40+ so not worth the price. If I could.... I would ask for our $$ back. I believe you get what you pay for and am totally fine paying a high price for something if it is worth it, this place is NOT worth it! Don't think we will be ordering from here again unfortunately

nhlUy_63Rrm3D2UHtqqxRg.text: Awesome food. Harry is fantastic and comes out to talk with his guests. Will come back here for sure when we come back in town.

76TCmYcX4J46FxhkKp1uDw.text: First let's just say I'm from LA and this is the first place I come to when I'm in Vegas!! Harry is super friendly and makes all your cravings go away. I highly recommend you try out this place if you haven't already. You'll see me in few months again Harry, Thanks!!!!!

WjPwitz6M_y-i2oY7bVdRA.text: Really enjoyed our meal here. I believe his name was Harry, he was great. Prices are great for the portion you are getting.  Food was very good. Oddly, the French fries were probably my favorite thing we had. Will definitely come back.
